name: City of death
description:
Welcome friends who love adventure and are eager to explore to Adventure Island.

You need to manipulate the character to eat all the coins at the designated time!

This is a quiet island that you need to explore step by step.



As an explorer, you need to have sharp observation and good mobility, and be fully prepared to explore endless islands. take care



The surrounding islands are very dangerous. Don't fall into the sea, otherwise your adventure will be in trouble.



Players can experience rich game content in the game, with beautiful pixel style graphics.



Players explore a mysterious desert island world in the game.
